## setup

```{bash}
cat ../inst/extdata/instrument.csv \
  | grep Proteomics \
  | awk -F";" '
    BEGIN{
      print "digraph G {"
      print "\trankdir = LR;"
      print "\tnode [shape=box, style=rounded, fontname=\"Arial\"];"
      print "\tedge [fontname=\"Arial\", fontsize=10];"
      print "\tgraph [bgcolor=white, fontname=\"Arial\", fontsize=12];"
      print ""
      print "\t// Area node"
      print "\tProteomics [shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, fontsize=14, fontweight=bold];"
      print ""
    }
    {
      instrument = $2$1
      lc = $2$1$4
      system = $2$1$4$3
      
      print "\t// Instrument: " $1
      print "\t" instrument " [style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];"
      print "\t" lc " [style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];"
      print "\t" csystem " [style=filled, fillcolor=lightcoral];"
      print "\tProteomics -> " instrument " -> " lc " -> " csystem ";"
      print ""
    }
    END{
      print "\t// Legend"
      print "\tsubgraph cluster_legend {"
      print "\t\tlabel=\"Legend\";"
      print "\t\tstyle=filled;"
      print "\t\tfillcolor=lightgray;"
      print "\t\tarea_legend [label=\"Area\", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];"
      print "\t\tinstrument_legend [label=\"Instrument\", style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];"
      print "\t\tlc_legend [label=\"LC System\", style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];"
      print "\t\tcsystem_legend [label=\"Control System\", style=filled, fillcolor=lightcoral];"
      print "\t}"
      print "}"
    }' > proteomics.dot 
```
